thread.title: Perfect for a weekend stay with lovely happy staff
thread.title_full: Perfect for a weekend stay with lovely happy staff - Review of Grange Rochester Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: stef b
title: Perfect for a weekend stay with lovely happy staff
text: Stayed with my son for his 14th birthday. Rooms are grand. The staff are so nice. Only a few mins walk from Victoria station, so it's great if u want to great the train from Gatwick. One of the accommodation staff even folder my pjs ! Highly recommend, will be back !
